attributes.review: I downloaded this app because I admire Trump Oppar but instead it asked me if I liked a picture of a Cheeto. Boy, that was one messed up Cheeto. Any way I kept looking, hoping to find my senpai but than it asked for where I lived. So I thought if I put my address, Senpai Trump Oppar would show up at my house and give me a signed autograph of his underwear. But instead... in my mailbox... WAS A CHEETO! Ok well it wasn’t a real Cheeto, it was in a picture. BUT IT WAS JUST AS UNPLEASANT AS THE LIVE ACTION FILM. I am scarred for life 😭
attributes.title: Senpai Trump Oppar 😍

attributes.review:
I thought this would help me support the grate pumpkin skinned president of ours after I saw an ad of a lady pointing at me constantly but it turned out to be an app where tump himself sends you tweets about how he will send the military to come harm me and I have been traumatized ever sense. And for the countless other people who have experienced the same thing as I did please just remember it will get better. ✨🧚
𝓻𝓮𝓶𝓮𝓶𝓫𝓮𝓻 🤔𝓽𝓱𝓮 ✨𝓽𝓲𝓶𝓮𝓼⌛️𝔀𝓮🤞🏾𝓱𝓪𝓭😪𝓽𝓱𝓮 😭 𝓽𝓲𝓶𝓮𝓼 ⏰ 𝓽𝓱𝓪𝓽🤥𝔂𝓸𝓾 👧 𝓪𝓷𝓭😴𝓶𝓮👦 𝓱𝓪𝓭😰
attributes.title: Horrible

attributes.review: Not only does it glitch and show horrific images of an orange alien but it’s EXTREMELY SLOW. How can people say “Keep America Great” when the they can’t even keep the app FUNCTIONING properly? C’mon do the BARE MINIMUM, but then again Trump can’t even wear a mask in public let alone put any effort into making a good app. Absolutely atrocious. Almost want to delete my Apple account and throw my entire phone away after getting this app!!!!
attributes.title: How is this app still running?!

attributes.review: One reason I hate this app is because it will steal your fridge. Second reason I hate this app is because my phone got cracked. third reason I hate this app is because I broke a glass while I was downloading it. Fourth reason I hate this app is because my laptop broke and got crack. This reason I hate this app is because my brother is annoying me six reason I hate this app my cat threw up while I was also downloading this app.
attributes.title: Horrible app

attributes.title: trump supporters are cousin fü.ckers

attributes.review: Clearly apple is giving anyone an app. Like this homophobic, transphobic, racist man. You might as well be giving annoying orange an app, at least the oranges skin tone is believable. This app is not user friendly. And if you were looking for trump memes, you will be disappointed. He’s a petty billionaire that can’t take a joke. This app destroyed my marriage and made me loose my sense of smell because of all that cheap spray tan he’s always wearing. Hope you’re happy apple.
attributes.title: Worst app!!

attributes.review: My first terrible experience started when I downloaded this app my chihuahua was thrown out the window by that orange flaming Cheeto😭🤬🤬😤. Next thing that happened was my Character in this app was not as orange as my president and I asked for a flaming hot Cheeto man and they gave me a purple man it is disgusting that I have to even wrote this review but it is important for everyone in the worlds safety😡. Apple please take down this app because it is not fit for the qualifications.
attributes.title: Disgusting 🤢

attributes.review: I’ve had this app for no longer than five seconds! I’m upset about having to leave such a bad review after only five seconds but it’s just so bad that I felt I needed to. After only five seconds, this app made me throw up! That’s right! It made me actually vomit! I don’t know why but it might have something to do with Trump being extremely racist, homophobic, and many others...that’s just a guess though.
attributes.title: Terrible!

attributes.review: this app is so horrible, when i downloaded it my phone crashed and shutdown. when i turned it back on i realized that all of my photos and apps were gone. all i had left was the stuff in my icloud which wasn’t much. i feel as if the government stole all of my information which i am not comfortable with at all. if you plan on keeping all of your information don’t download this app. it is horrible.
attributes.title: WORST APP EVER

attributes.review: this app took my verginity and didn't give it back. a solid 0/10. i tried to run and screamed no. but it didn't work. they track your location and nibble on your toes at night. i woke up to red white and blue trump 2020 nail polish on my toes. 😤. my pet shark walked away from me when i tried to hug it. because this app told him to. i'm ashamed on who made this.😠. my pet unicorn ran away in FEAR of his orange sabastion bails lookin head. 😕. rate this a 1 star. 😤🦶👄🦶 i be on my way.
attributes.title: horrible.
